sentences.english: Time is flying, two years passed again unconsciously.
sentences.chinese: 光阴荏苒，不知不觉又过了两年。

sentences.english: Time continues, times flies, and this world remains.
sentences.chinese: 时光流逝，光阴荏苒，日月如梭，世界依旧。

sentences.english: We quickened our pave more and more as the time sped by.
sentences.chinese: 光阴荏苒，我们也在不断地加快步伐。

sentences.english: But then life moves along to confront us with realities, and slowly but surely this truth dawns upon us.
sentences.chinese: 但光阴荏苒，面对现实，我们才渐渐明白并非如此。

sentences.english: Time went by, and winter came back again.
The traditional buildings are still well preserved after passing so many years.
sentences.chinese: 时光荏苒，这些传统的建筑群依然保存完好。

sentences.english: But time went by, and the boy grew older. And the tree was often alone.
sentences.chinese: 但时光荏苒，男孩长大了，而这棵树常常是孤单的。

sentences.english: Having gone through years of renovation, this green tree has already turned into a symbol with the glorious spirits of a prosperous family.
sentences.chinese: 苍翠的树木经历岁月荏苒，是深植望族精神的象征物。

sentences.english: Nine years have passed in our new century.
sentences.chinese: 时光荏苒，一个新的世纪已走过了九年。

sentences.english: Time flies, time may erase all it really can be.
sentences.chinese: 时光荏苒，岁月也许真的可以抹去一切吧。

sentences.english: How time flies, it has been ten years since the last time I saw him.
sentences.chinese: 时光荏苒，斗转星移，许多年就这样过去了。

sentences.english: Act I Twenty-five years have passed.
sentences.chinese: 第一幕时光荏苒，转眼25年过去了。

sentences.english: As the days went past, Jonathan found himself thinking time and again of the Earth from which he had come.
sentences.chinese: 光阴荏苒，乔纳森发现自己不时思念他所离开的尘世。

sentences.english: As time goes on, I have become a chess fan.
sentences.chinese: 光阴荏苒，我已经称为棋迷。

sentences.english: Time whether good or bad, passes quickly.
sentences.chinese: 时光荏苒，无论是好还是坏。

definition: the passage of the years/the flow of time
a white steed flits past a crack (idiom); How time flies!
(literary) to slip/(of looks etc) to fade away/(of time) to slip away/to squander (time, opportunities)/to dillydally
time flies like an arrow (idiom); How time flies!
the sun and moon like a shuttle (idiom); How time flies!
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
